description:
Lina and Gourry go to a Magic shop in town to sell the treasures that Lina snatched from the bandits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bad! Mirra Otoko wa Shumi Janai!
Bad! Mummy Men Aren`t My Type!
Bad! ミイラ男は趣味じゃない!
Méchant ! Je n`aime pas les momies !
Păcat! Mumiile nu sunt genul meu!
Плохо! Мужчины-мумии не в моём вкусе!
